revision.text: {| class="wikitable" |- ! NPC Name !! Location !! Function |- | [[File:Musician.png|30px]]Musician || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Castelia City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Meloetta (Aria)}} |- | [[File:Ruin Maniac.png|30px]]Ruin Maniac || [[Relic Castle]] || Informs the player how to get {{Pokemon|Volcarona}} |- | [[File:School Kid (female).png|30px]]Excited Child || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Humilau City]] || Informs the player about the roaming nature of {{Pokemon|Tornadus}} and {{Pokemon|Thundurus}}. |- | [[File:Backpacker (male).png|30px]]Explorer || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nimbasa City]] || Informs the player about Mimics and the exclusive mimic in [[Relic Castle]] |- | [[File:Gentleman.png|30px]]Fan Club Chairman || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Icirrus City]] || Informs the player about how to obtain [[File:Black DNA.png|30px]][[Black DNA]] and [[File:White DNA.png|30px]][[White DNA]] |- | [[File:Professor Juniper.png|30px]]Professor Juniper || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Tells the player what is needed to progress to the next [[Regions|region]]. |- | Professor Juniper's Aide || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Nuvema Town]] || Informs the player about increased roamer rates. |- | [[File:Professor Burner.png|30px]]Professor Burnet || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] || Explains to the player how to obtain [[Dream Orbs]]. |- | [[File:Dream Researcher.png|30px]]Dream Researcher || [[Towns & Cities#Unova|Black and White Park]] || Talks about [[Dream Orbs]] and hints at a reward if the player interact enough times with the mechanic. |- | [[File:Team Plasma (colress).png|30px]]Colress || [[P2 Laboratory]] || Challenges the player to defeat him to unlock the Rare Pok√©mon in the lab. |}
revision.comment: Importing a new version from external source
